thread.title: NYC exhibit showcases transit system's response to disasters, including 9-11, Superstorm Sandy
thread.title_full: NYC exhibit showcases transit system's response to disasters, including 9-11, Superstorm Sandy - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: NYC exhibit showcases transit system's response to disasters, including 9-11, Superstorm Sandy
text:
NEW YORK, N.Y. - An upcoming exhibit highlights the critical role of New York City transit workers during natural and man-made disasters, including 9-11 and Superstorm Sandy.
"Bringing Back the City: Mass Transit Responds to Crisis" opens Sept. 30 at the New York Transit Museum in Brooklyn.
It looks at how the transit system prepared for and responded to such disasters as the blizzard of 2010 and the blackout of 2003, when transit workers evacuated subway riders to safety.
The show uses photographs, oral histories, artifacts and multimedia displays to tell the story.
The exhibit grew out of the museum's own response to Sandy and stories of transit workers using their skills to bring the city back.
___
Online: www.mta.info/mta/museum
